featured.text: They were behind schedule and had to apply for manpower to complete their project in time.
It was then decided that Alan Shepard should relieve himself in his space suit, and continue with the mission as scheduled.

Nowadays many companies adopt a ______ work schedule which allows their employees to decide when to arrive at work—from as early as 6 a.m. to as late as 11 a.m. (A) relative (B) severe (C) primitive (D) flexible 2.
Despite his busy schedule, the President ______ the school’s graduation ceremony with his presence and a heartwarming speech. (A) praised (B) graced (C) addressed (D) credited 10.
A giant egg-timer will be set up in the Place de la Concorde and its sand will begin running after a solar eclipse scheduled on April 11, 1999.

other.text: Wendy is good at writing and she doesn’t like to work according to a fixed schedule.
It often demands even greater effort in adjustment since we are not quick enough to catch up with the new time schedule.
Steve has several meetings to attend every day; therefore, he has to work on a very _____ schedule.

definition.en_def: A plan for carrying out a process or procedure, giving lists of intended events and times.
definition.example: I need to check my schedule before confirming the meeting.
